title: Executive Order 11777-Amending Executive Order No. 11691, Adjusting Rates of Pay for Certain Statutory Pay Systems
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by subchapter I of chapter 53 of title 5 of the United States Code, section 6 of Executive Order No. 11691 of December 15, 1972, is amended to read as follows:
"Sec. 6. This order shall take effect as of the first day of the first applicable pay period beginning on or after October 1, 1972."
citation: Richard Nixon, Executive Order 11777-Amending Executive Order No. 11691, Adjusting Rates of Pay for Certain Statutory Pay Systems Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/307141
